scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Our Time' by ReGLOSS.
MC section where ReGLOSS says goodbye to the audience.
Performance of the song 'Genesis' by hololive English -Advent-.

subtitles.original: Never life, can make it on time
subtitles.english: Never life, can make it on time

subtitles.original: ずっと追い続けてたいだけに見離されても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm abandoned just because I want to keep chasing

subtitles.original: No worry 私には私が付いてる
subtitles.english: No worry, I have myself with me

subtitles.original: 宵が醒めるまで あと少しだけ
subtitles.english: Just a little longer until the night wakes up

subtitles.original: 真実捉える残像 So step with the race
subtitles.english: An afterimage capturing the truth, so step with the race

subtitles.original: 次の季節を越え Bloom me Bloom me
subtitles.english: Beyond the next season, Bloom me Bloom me

subtitles.original: どうかこの音を止めないで
subtitles.english: Please don't stop this sound

subtitles.original: Our time yellow yellow lollipop lollipop ずっとしたい子
subtitles.english: Our time yellow yellow lollipop lollipop, the one who wants it forever

subtitles.original: Our time yellow yellow lollipop lollipop Oh Oh Let's enjoy the moment
subtitles.english: Our time yellow yellow lollipop lollipop Oh Oh Let's enjoy the moment

subtitles.original: Looking into the mirror 絡まってる蜘蛛の糸
subtitles.english: Looking into the mirror, entangled spider webs

subtitles.original: It happens overtime 躍らされたままじゃ不満だ
subtitles.english: It happens overtime, I'm not satisfied with being played

subtitles.original: 欲に従って時を編み上げて
subtitles.english: Follow your desires and weave time together

subtitles.original: Always be honest 永遠に変わらないもの
subtitles.english: Always be honest, something that will never change

subtitles.original: Yellow yellow 手を取り合えば そこに理由はいらない
subtitles.english: Yellow yellow, if we hold hands, we don't need a reason

subtitles.original: Yellow yellow 染まる赤い結晶 熱い衝動 Bad Bad
subtitles.english: Yellow yellow, the red crystals are dyed, hot impulse Bad Bad

subtitles.original: It's not a dream, just a test, 希望に目を閉じず
subtitles.english: It's not a dream, just a test, without closing your eyes to hope

subtitles.original: 退屈すぎた運命や人生ごと受け入れ
subtitles.english: Accept your boring fate and life as a whole

subtitles.original: 真摯に手探り 読めない 展開 掴んで
subtitles.english: Sincere groping, grab the unreadable development

subtitles.original: Run Run Jump 準備いいかい ぶち抜いて Go Out
subtitles.english: Run Run Jump, are you ready? Punch through and Go Out

subtitles.original: 立ち抜ける 01 忘れて 執着地点 上へ Or Heaven
subtitles.english: Breaking through 01, forget it, to the final point, upwards Or Heaven

subtitles.original: No time to wait 今だけを信じて 最後のフィナーレまで共に進め
subtitles.english: No time to wait, believe only in the now, move forward together until the final finale

subtitles.original: 宵が醒めるまで あと少しだけ
subtitles.english: Just a little longer until the night wakes up

subtitles.original: 真実捉える残像 So step with the race
subtitles.english: An afterimage capturing the truth, so step with the race

subtitles.original: 次の季節を越え Blue me Blue me
subtitles.english: Beyond the next season, Bloom me Blue me

subtitles.original: どうかこの音を止めないで
subtitles.english: Please don't stop this sound

subtitles.original: Our time yellow yellow lollipop lollipop ずっとしたい子
subtitles.english: Our time yellow yellow lollipop lollipop, the one who wants it forever

subtitles.original: Our time yellow yellow lollipop lollipop Oh Oh Let's enjoy the moment
subtitles.english: Our time yellow yellow lollipop lollipop Oh Oh Let's enjoy the moment

subtitles.original: またねー！
subtitles.english: See ya!

subtitles.original: またねー！
subtitles.english: See ya!

subtitles.original: 楽しかったー！
subtitles.english: That was fun!

subtitles.original: ReGLOSSでした！バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: We were ReGLOSS! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: Jump, open up your eyes, feel the music start to rise
subtitles.english: Jump, open up your eyes, feel the music start to rise

subtitles.original: Got to break the world and let me in
subtitles.english: Got to break the world and let me in

subtitles.original: I knew I was meant to be, living life so fast and free
subtitles.english: I knew I was meant to be, living life so fast and free

subtitles.original: Try to keep your eyes on me, this is where my story all begins
subtitles.english: Try to keep your eyes on me, this is where my story all begins

subtitles.original: Living in an epic legacy, ready for the brave to come and see
subtitles.english: Living in an epic legacy, ready for the brave to come and see

subtitles.original: Give it away so easy, I can't get enough
subtitles.english: Give it away so easy, I can't get enough

subtitles.original: Crossing borders, no limits, haven't you heard? I'm fearless
subtitles.english: Crossing borders, no limits, haven't you heard? I'm fearless

subtitles.original: Ready, set, go, let's do this! Watch me, watch me, watch me...
subtitles.english: Ready, set, go, let's do this! Watch me, watch me, watch me...

subtitles.original: ...watch me be a diva, I'm gonna raise your fever, shaking up all the crowd
subtitles.english: ...watch me be a diva, I'm gonna raise your fever, shaking up all the crowd

subtitles.original: Making some noise when I'm not allowed, living my life out loud
subtitles.english: Making some noise when I'm not allowed, living my life out loud

subtitles.original: I have awakened to wisdom beyond understanding
subtitles.english: I have awakened to wisdom beyond understanding

subtitles.original: I keep on doubting in my anthem
subtitles.english: I keep on doubting in my anthem

subtitles.original: Oh, don't blame me if I shine too bright
subtitles.english: Oh, don't blame me if I shine too bright

subtitles.original: Oh, can't help it if I start a fire
subtitles.english: Oh, can't help it if I start a fire

subtitles.original: Oh, pay attention to me, 'cause this is only the beginning
subtitles.english: Oh, pay attention to me, 'cause this is only the beginning

subtitles.original: It's our Genesis!
subtitles.english: It's our Genesis!

subtitles.original: Coming to wreak some havoc, how do you like this badness?
subtitles.english: Coming to wreak some havoc, how do you like this badness?

subtitles.original: I'm embracing my madness, can you hear it?
subtitles.english: I'm embracing my madness, can you hear it?

subtitles.original: Whispers bang around your window (Advent! Advent!)
subtitles.english: Whispers bang around your window (Advent! Advent!)

subtitles.original: Rumors reaching a crescendo (Advent! Advent!)
subtitles.english: Rumors reaching a crescendo (Advent! Advent!)

subtitles.original: No humble beginning, I'm destined for great things
subtitles.english: No humble beginning, I'm destined for great things

subtitles.original: I'm sure you've heard of me by now, woah!
subtitles.english: I'm sure you've heard of me by now, woah!

subtitles.original: Midnight, diamonds in the dark side (Advent! Advent!)
subtitles.english: Midnight, diamonds in the dark side (Advent! Advent!)

subtitles.original: Starlight, take me on a joyride (Advent! Advent!)
subtitles.english: Starlight, take me on a joyride (Advent! Advent!)

subtitles.original: My crime is my passion, I'm mayhem in action
subtitles.english: My crime is my passion, I'm mayhem in action

subtitles.original: I know what day it is, this is our Genesis!
subtitles.english: I know what day it is, this is our Genesis!

subtitles.original: I enjoy the rage when I misbehave, take center stage
subtitles.english: I enjoy the rage when I misbehave, take center stage

subtitles.original: Let the funk commence, but you know I'm gonna get intense
subtitles.english: Let the funk commence, but you know I'm gonna get intense

subtitles.original: There are loopholes I'm smoking, the rules can all be broken
subtitles.english: There are loopholes I'm smoking, the rules can all be broken

subtitles.original: I'm running on a rampage, the world is a blank page
subtitles.english: I'm running on a rampage, the world is a blank page

subtitles.original: I'm writing my story in flames and in glory
subtitles.english: I'm writing my story in flames and in glory

subtitles.original: And they're gonna know me by name, some more!
subtitles.english: And they're gonna know me by name, some more!

subtitles.original: Oh, this my promised land
subtitles.english: Oh, this my promised land

subtitles.original: Oh, the future's in my hands
subtitles.english: Oh, the future's in my hands

subtitles.original: Oh, they don't understand that I'm a star in the making, awaking, awaking!
subtitles.english: Oh, they don't understand that I'm a star in the making, awaking, awaking!
